title: Looking for Kaiâ€™Sa Artist/Artwork
body:
Long story short, I’m building my gaming office now that everything has worked out, and upon playing Kai’Sa...I’ve had the most fun in League I’ve had in years! 

Thus, I feel she needs to be part of my office some how. If I could find the artist or artists that created Kai’Sa, I would love to pay for or some how earn a piece of artwork/concept art for her to frame in my office. 

It’s a huge request, but something I NEED to complete my office! She’s absolutely amazing, congrats and thank yous to the team involved in her design! 

Let me know, thank you!!

replies.body:
Hey Dueos thank you for the kind words appreciate it :)

As for art stuff you can find The Bravo Ray's concept work of her here - https://the-bravo-ray.deviantart.com/

You can also find FeralPony's work of her here -
 https://twitter.com/RiotTokkelossie/status/971855505378312192

There we go haha! Request with all League luck and willpower. If I printed and framed one of the peices of concept art...is there any way I could get Bravo Ray to sign it? Iâ€™d be more than happy to pay shipping both ways and even provide a picture once itâ€™s hung up!  Iâ€™d reach out to him on Twitter, but he doesnâ€™t seem very active on there lol ðŸ˜‚

Either way, thank you everyone!

Yeah if you really want to ship it I'll make him sign it. hit me up on twitter @Kindlejack

I could get the whole Kai'sa team to sign it.

she looks really cool, one of the best designs for a female champ and in general  (liked ornn too) but imo she is hard to play. her range is the most frustrating in range for nearly every CC and you cant really dodge it like e.g. Vayne. and why does her ult-shield needs to decay after 3 sec? her ult and her range are - for me - the most frustrating things.

but she looks really sick and i LOVE Kerrigan and Pharah. Sooooo... :3

gaming office? you design games?

As much as I wish I designed games, I currently do not haha. Iâ€™m actually a customer service/sales consultant for a large company. Just building up my at home gaming office piece by piece! (League, WoW, and Overwatch mainly)

Who knows, Iâ€™ve been contemplating applying for a position at riot or at least chatting to a rioter about it. (Probably not game development, but more so customer service). Only thing is, Iâ€™m in North Dakota..so options would be limited unless it could be from home :P
Go to her Wiki page, specifically her Development subpage, I have uploaded all of her currently online concept art as well as who did it.
If you go to the Nexus site and see her developer article there is a bunch of concept art. I doubt you'll be able to commission Riot artists through the boards though.
